thread.title: Liverpool target Inaki Williams knocks Athletic Bilbao team-mate UNCONSCIOUS during training
thread.title_full: Liverpool target Inaki Williams knocks Athletic Bilbao team-mate UNCONSCIOUS during training

author: gstonehouse
title: Liverpool target Inaki Williams knocks Athletic Bilbao team-mate UNCONSCIOUS during training

organizations.name: manchester united kante keep him away n'golo kante

text:
TOTAL KO Liverpool target Inaki Williams knocks Athletic Bilbao team-mate UNCONSCIOUS during training 
Goalkeeper Alex Remiro taken to hospital after being hit in the head by powerful striker's shot By Gary Stonehouse Comments LIVERPOOL target Inaki Williams packs some punch in his shots – enough to KNOCKOUT a goalkeeper. 
The striker did just that on Wednesday as his team-mate Alex Remiro was rushed to hospital after being struck on the head by the ball from the forward’s effort during training. Getty Images 6 Inaki Williams inadvertently knocked out a team-mate at training on Wednesday 
Club doctors were quickly on the scene to help the stricken 21-year-old stopper as he was stretchered from the field and taken to be assessed by medical experts. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest FOOTBALL news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Bilbao confirmed the news on Twitter, saying: “Alejandro Remiro has suffered a head trauma during Wednesday’s training session. 
“He was conscious and has been taken to a nearby hospital to undergo further tests.” 
His team-mate, midfielder Benat Etxebarria, revealed the squad’s astonishment and worry at seeing their colleague struck down. MOST READ IN FOOTBALL Liverpool and Arsenal fear being robbed of Champions League spot by Manchester United and Leicester Ron's Real nemesis Cristiano Ronaldo and a host of Real Madrid stars' futures could be under threat as Monchi comes in CAN'T KEEP CALM AND CARRA ON Hilarious moment Jamie Carragher snaps at Jamie Redknapp for interrupting his expert analysis on Sky Sports Brawl in Brazil Chaos in Brazil as local derby erupts into a mass fight between players and fans out on their own Luke Shaw, Anthony Martial and Bastian Schweinsteiger sent to train on their own at Manchester United Kante Keep Him Away N'Golo Kante celebrates Leicester's Champions League win over Sevilla from King Power stands 
He said: “It was a great shock. He got hit very hard but it seems that he’s OK.” 
Remiro has only recently returned to the La Liga side following a loan spell with second-tier Levante. 
He is currently the club’s third-choice keeper. Getty Images Goalkeeper Alex Remiro was taken to hospital after being KOd from an Inaki Williams shot that struck him in the head Getty Images Alex Remiro has only just returned to Athletic Bilbao after a loan spell at Levante Getty Images Bilbao midfielder Benat Etxebarria said the whole squad was ‘shocked’ at the incident Getty Images Inaki Williams is a summer transfer target for Premier League big boys Liverpool PA:Press Association
